Texts.Chs: 这本书长达266页，详细介绍了管理夜族人的荣誉准则的各种规则。似乎他们所做的几乎所有事情都在某种程度上受到这些条款的约束。甚至还有一些规定在吃饭的时候要有适当的荣誉的原则。这似乎相当荒谬。
Texts.Eng: This book is 266 pages in length, and details the various rules that govern the Honor code of the Nightar people. It seems that nearly everything they do is subject to this code, in some small way. There are even tenets dictating proper honor during mealtimes. This seems rather absurd.
